name: Dice of Doom (Lordofcheese)
description:
Rules

This is important, the game is a bit complicated.

So, you take 6 dice, put them in a cup(by clicking on them), and roll(by clicking on the cup)

Then, there are combinations of dice which let you increase the damage to the incoming Dice of Doom. 

If you get 3 of 2, 3, 4, 5 or 6, you get 200, 300, 400, 500 or 600 points.

For every 1 you score, you get 100 points, if you get 3 you get 1000.

You can also roll a streek, which means you have 1 of each number.(gives you 1000 Points)

After rolling you have the option to reroll, giving you the option to increase your points, in case you got a low amount. But doing that, you also run the risk of rolling a dead loss, meaning you deal 0 damage to the monster and making it able to stop forward. If you are satisfied with your points, click the shoot button.+

This was made in 2 days for the gmtk game jam 2022, and i am not used to such low amount of time, therefore this is a really rushed and unfinished game.
